exercises.name: Focus Ball Game
exercises.explanation: Follow the bouncing ball with your eyes only, no head movement!
exercises.benefit: Helps improve focus and reduce blurry vision

exercises.name: Blinking Bunny
exercises.explanation: Blink rapidly like a bunny to refresh your eyes!
exercises.benefit: Helps reduce frequent blinking and watery eyes by keeping them moist

exercises.name: Palming Relaxation
exercises.explanation: Cover your eyes with your palms and breathe deeply to relax.
exercises.benefit: Provides general relaxation and soothes tired eyes

exercises.name: Focus Switch Game
exercises.explanation: Switch your focus between your thumb and a distant object.
exercises.benefit: Helps with blurry vision by improving focus skills

exercises.explanation: Imagine a gentle waterfall washing over your eyes.
exercises.benefit: Relieves watery eyes by promoting relaxation

exercises.name: Focus Training Game
exercises.explanation: Try to focus on different objects from near to far without moving your head.
exercises.benefit: Helps improve focus and reduce blurry vision.

exercises.name: Eye Strain Relief
exercises.explanation: Close your eyes gently, then open them wide. Repeat to relax your eye muscles.
exercises.benefit: Reduces eye strain and provides relaxation.

exercises.name: Tracking Movement Exercise
exercises.explanation: Follow a moving finger or pen with your eyes, making sure they move smoothly.
exercises.benefit: Improves smooth tracking and helps with astigmatism.
